Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.report

Class SignatureReport

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.report.SignatureReport
Direct Known Subclasses:
NotICPBrasilSignatureReport, TimeStampReport
public class SignatureReport extends Object
Esta classe representa o relatório de uma assinatura
